title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 November 2016 - XWiki

11:58 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: I need to backport XWIKI-13889 since it's needed by XE-1596  
12:00 <gdelhumeau> done  
12:00 <acotiuga1> has joined #xwiki  
12:01 <gdelhumeau> the sad part is that they just have release 1.12.1 in the meantime  
12:01 <acotiuga> has quit  
12:42 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has joined #xwiki  
12:42 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> Hi, I am trying with xwiki enterprise 8.4 ldap authentication, but at login it shows invalid credentials. Can anyone please help me?  
13:55 <Pbas> Hi, I'm not a specialist but invalid credentials mean wrong password typing (or login).  
13:56 <Pbas> You can enabled debug mode: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LDAP/Authenticator/#HEnableLDAPdebuglog  
13:56 <Pbas> and found some use cases here: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LDAP/Authenticator/UseCases/  
13:59 <Pbas> @ xwikiorg\_guest\_5  
14:05 <tmortagne> xwikiorg\_guest\_5: I agree with Pbas, the best at this stage is usually to enable debug log to get all the details  
14:05 <tmortagne> among other things you will see what XWiki sent to the LDAP server and what the LDAP server answered
